text: A yesli My dadim yemu vkusit' milost' Nashu posle nuzhdy, on, konechno, govorit: "Eto - mne, i ya ne dumayu, chto nastupit chas. A yesli ya budu vozvrashchen k svoyemu Gospodu, to, konechno, dlya menya u nego yest' milost'". My, konechno, soobshchim tem, kotoryye ne verovali, chto oni sovershili, i dadim im vkusit' surovoye nakazaniye
